content: p o m p o m c h e v r o n a nooch fiber pattern by mariana martins this hat is a quick and satisfying knit the colorful chevrons add visual interest while the oversized pompom adds some fun 1 yarn one set of four nooch fiber morningside sock mini skeins ac 1 ac 2 ac 3 ac 4 and one skein nooch fiber chelsea sock mc available at noochfiber com or four small skeins of colorful sock yarn 45 yds each and 75 yds of a neutral sock yarn needles and notions size 3 knitting needles this hat is knit in the round so choose your preferred method circulars magic loop or dpns one 1 stitch marker to mark beginning of round blocked gauge and finished size gauge in 3x2 ribbing k3 p2 2 = 13 stitches across 9 stitches down always check your gauge and change your needle size as needed 2 pattern overview this hat is knit in the round each main color chevron is 4 row while the alternate color chevrons are 6 row each the end result is a slightly slouchy hat for a smaller hat reduce the number of row in each chevron hat body in mc co 130 and join for knitting in the round place stitch marker to mark beginning of round knit in 2x3 rib for 1 5 inches row 1 *kfb k4 s1 k2tog psso k4 kfb* repeat until end of row 10 times total row 2 knit all stitches repeat row 1 and 2 one more time two repeats total switch to ac 1 repeat row 1 and 2 six times total switch to mc repeat row 1 and 2 four times
